name: Head Ball Hyper Casual Game
description: The Head Ball Hyper Casual Game is a new type of sport that involves the player's head. It was designed with an emphasis on creativity, agility and balance in mind while also ensuring they have fun! At Head Ball, they are always looking for new ways to make the game more exciting. One way is by giving their head coaches an opportunity to show off their creative and innovative side while staying competitive on all levels!
